text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly states that the requirement to inform individuals about data collection falls under the GDPR and details the necessary information that should have been provided, which aligns with the requirements of Article 13 of the GDPR (information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject).", "criterion_id": "087e13e6-49bc-4d40-a8c6-9fcaf4367c1e"}
